title: Champion select concept *not mine
body: This is the best champion select concept I've seen and it needs to happen rito please

replies.body:
This is old as the shit jesus took right after they killed him

I have seen it at least 8 times now
Be fair and link the original creator is possible :)
There isn't enough room in the center to fit all of the champions to pick in. Its to enclosed.
We need this,we also need an loading screen chat box to keep us occupied while waiting.
